title: Mini-Ep 126: Repressed Sexuality Never
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 126: Repressed Sexuality Never
itunes:subtitle: Kate is in search of a THICC face moisturizer, Doree finds her pandemic bralette, and listeners send in their thoughts about exploring their sexuality and pondering identity, how to buy perfume, and eating cereal salad.  Activity/Wo...
description:
Kate is in search of a THICC face moisturizer, Doree finds her pandemic bralette, and listeners send in their thoughts about exploring their sexuality and pondering identity, how to buy perfume, and eating cereal salad. 

 

Activity/Word of the Day: Let’s do a crossword!


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


Find everything we mention on the show on our website, forever35podcast.com. And please take our listener survey — it really helps the show!


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

Good Moms Bad Choices Podcast - Episodes drop every Wednesday morning. Listen and subscribe on Apple Podcasts or wherever you listen to podcasts.
